text: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translation.en.sahih: So we took retribution from them; then see how was the end of the deniers.
translation.id.indonesian: Maka Kami binasakan mereka maka perhatikanlah bagaimana kesudahan orang-orang yang mendustakan itu.
